spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_E
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: E - Reduced register file size (16 registers only)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_M
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: M - Integer multiplication and division hardware

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zbkb
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zbkb - Bit manipulation instructions for cryptography

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zbkc
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zbkc - Carry-less multiply instructions for cryptography

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zfinx
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zfinx - Embedded FPU (using integer register file)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zknd
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zknd - Scalar cryptographic - NIST AES decryption

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zkne
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zkne - Scalar cryptographic - NIST AES encryption

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zknh
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zknh - Scalar cryptographic - NIST hash functions

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zksed
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zksed - Scalar cryptographic - ShangMi block cyphers

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RISCV_ISA_Zksh
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Zksh - Scalar cryptographic - ShangMi hash functions

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: CPU_RF_HW_RST_EN
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Full HW reset for register file

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: PMP_NAP_MODE_EN
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Enable PMP NAPOT and NA4 modes
